title: 5 mins leave buster for fucking shit game
body:
i got a fucking 5 min leave buster because i turned of the game after it froze my whole pc
thats all i have to fucking say...........
league turns off pc freezes i get 5 mins leavebuster

replies.body: I'd like to help you out with this, but need some more information.  Are you receiving any specific errors, or can you explain where and when this issue occurs?  A leaverbuster will only apply after multiple leaves, and it's important we get this fixed up to prevent escalating your lower priority queue.  Let me know in more detail!
yeah fam, I am so ready for a 1 hour leaver buster cuz my game freezes(and takes a lil bit to start up again but not ages). thank guys!
